Yeoul

Yeonyi

Introduction

Red Candle (Korean: 레드캔들) is a South Korean jazz, R&B, and indie duo consisting of Yeoul and Yeonyi. They debuted on October 20, 2016 with the digital single album "Flowing In Love."
